description: This file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named NotesController for managing notes via CRUD operations. It handles endpoints for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting notes, scoped to an authenticated user.

classes.name: NotesController
classes.description: Rest controller for handling CRUD operations for notes, scoped to authenticated users.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of notes for the authenticated user.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note for the authenticated user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID if owned by the authenticated user.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the title and content of a note owned by the user.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note owned by the user.
